info.name: Hide header - The Spokesman-Review
info.description: Auto-hide the page header and footer and the sidebar on the right side of the page. Each is reduced to a thin, horizontal placeholder, but expands again when you mouse over it.
info.additionalInfo: Adverts and social links are not displayed. If you want them back, simply comment out ("/* */") the relevant rules. (Oops! Easier said than done - UserStyles removed my comments.Yes, but only on Chrome.) 28 Jun: That huge corner ad escaped - it's back in its pen now.
